Title: 20 years after Hurricane Katrina, the Lower Ninth Ward in New Orleans still lags behind
Description:
No neighborhood was hit worse in Katrina than New Orleans' Lower Ninth Ward and it's been one of the slowest areas to rebound.
There's still an effort to attract new residents and businesses there.
